## Service.registered() method

Lifecycle method: registered

Signature:

```typescript
/** @virtual */
registered?(app: Framework): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                      | Description                            |
| --------- | ----------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| app       | [Framework](/api/bud-framework/framework) | [Framework](//bud-framework/framework) |

Returns:

Promise&lt;any&gt;

## Remarks

`registered` is called after all [Service.register()](/api/bud-framework/service/register) callbacks are complete.
